eecs.jago.element
Interface Visible

All Known Implementing Classes:
VisibleElement
public interface Visible

A Visible object has the ability to display itself if given a context to draw in.

Since:
4.1

Method Summary
 void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
          Draws the image of the object that implements this interface into a Java2D (Graphics2D) context.
 java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getBounds2D()
          Returns the bounding rectangle of any visible object.
 void setAppearance(java.lang.String url)
          Sets the picture of any object using this interface to the image identified by the URL provided.
 

Method Detail

setAppearance

public void setAppearance(java.lang.String url)
Sets the picture of any object using this interface to the image identified by the URL provided.

Parameters:
url - The URL of the picture to use.

getBounds2D

public java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getBounds2D()
Returns the bounding rectangle of any visible object.

Returns:
A Rectangle2D that completely encloses this object.

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
Draws the image of the object that implements this interface into a Java2D (Graphics2D) context.

Parameters:
g2 - The Graphics2D context to draw in.
